nodes.text: Vadlerio was a male Zabrak who worked as a bartender in the Shipwright Auxiliary Spaceport cantina on the planet Corellia. During the Great Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic the spaceport was controlled by the Republic. Vadlerio had brown hair and eyes and tanned skin. While at his stall he wore white and grey clothing.
Vadlerio first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic which was released in 2011 by BioWare. In the game he serves as a Republic cantina vendor on Corellia.
